thread.title: Re: DENIED: Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals upholds halt on President Trump’s travel ban
thread.title_full: Re: DENIED: Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals upholds halt on President Trump’s travel ban

author: Guan_yu
title: Re: DENIED: Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals upholds halt on President Trump’s travel ban
text:
DENIED: Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals upholds halt on President Trump’s travel ban; ‘SEE YOU IN COURT’ Posted at 6:33 pm on February 9, 2017 by Brett T. 
Not surprisingly, the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals has ruled that a lower court’s stay of President Trump’s travel ban will remain in place. 9th Circuit has ruled AGAINST Trump, @PeteWilliamsNBC reports; order blocking the ban remains in place 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) February 9, 2017 SAN FRANCISCO (AP) _ US appeals court refuses to reinstate Trump's ban on travelers from seven Muslim-majority nations. 
— Ken Thomas (@KThomasDC) February 9, 2017 Major setback for White House – appeals court rejects bid to reinstate Trump's travel ban for seven majority-Muslim countries 
— Chris Snyder (@ChrisSnyderFox) February 9, 2017 The 9th circuit in a unanimous ruling on the motion from the Trump administration to reinstate travel ban: DENIED pic.twitter.com/2jm94a5VbC 
— Matt Viser (@mviser) February 9, 2017 BREAKING NEWS — 9th Circuit Court of Appeals UPHOLDS the temporary restraining order – which means #Trump #travelban stays ON HOLD. 
— Steve Futterman (@sfutterman) February 9, 2017 BREAKING: 9th Circuit DENIES stay. https://t.co/HLs0EVbY2y pic.twitter.com/y9Plsl2w6W 
— Chris Geidner (@chrisgeidner) February 9, 2017 9th Circuit panel: DOJ did not show likelihood of success on merits & or prove that keeping ban on hold "would cause irreparable injury" pic.twitter.com/qBfIQF9AUn 
— Jordan Fabian (@Jordanfabian) February 9, 2017 Ruling by 9th Circuit Appeals Court means refugees & citizens from 7 Muslim-majority countries can still enter US. https://t.co/N795agZqDA pic.twitter.com/l9iljDrj33 
— Jim Roberts (@nycjim) February 9, 2017 . @PeteWilliamsNBC says 3 judges went into arguments on the merits in 28 page unanimous decision upholding restraining order on #travelban 
— Andrea Mitchell (@mitchellreports) February 9, 2017 BREAKING NEWS — the 9th Circuit Court decision to keep #travelban on hold was unanimous. One judge was appointed by George W. Bush 
— Steve Futterman (@sfutterman) February 9, 2017 9th Circuit to Trump: Get this weak cheese out of here. On every point, the three judges strongly reject the government's arguments. 
— Terry Moran (@TerryMoran) February 9, 2017 By ruling unanimously, the 3-judge panel of the 9th Circuit sent a loud and clear signal that judiciary will not be intimidated by POTUS. 
— Max Boot (@MaxBoot) February 9, 2017 It was very important that the court ruled unanimously, signalling that judges will not be steamrolled. A win for American institutions! 
— Nicholas Kristof (@NickKristof) February 9, 2017 9th Circuit rejects Trump on travel ban: "The government has pointed to no evidence” that anyone from 7 countries perpetrated attack in US. 
— Peter Baker (@peterbakernyt) February 9, 2017 Trending
